events.name: Leicester City at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: — Leicester plunged into more turmoil in the Premier League by losing 5-2 at Brighton on Sunday to remain in last place and without a win after six matches.
headlines.shortLinkText: Winless Leicester in turmoil after 5-2 loss at Brighton

headlines.description: — Marcus Rashford’s double and a debut goal for Antony secured Manchester United a fourth successive victory as a 3-1 win ended Arsenal's perfect start to the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Resurgent Man United beats Arsenal 3-1 for 4th straight win
